snippet: The commissioners, in a unanimous ruling, also set a cap on donations of the virtual currency.
abstract: Federal Election Commission votes to allow political committees to accept Bitcoin donations and outlines ways that virtual currency can be used by federally regulated campaigns; also sets cap on donations of the virtual currency.
lead_paragraph: The commissioners, in a unanimous ruling, also set a cap on donations of the virtual currency.

headline.main: Election Commission Votes to Allow Bitcoin Donations
headline.print_headline: Election Commission Votes to Allow Bitcoin Donations
